name: Lillith

trigger.text: If your leader is Vegapunk, play this card.

text: On Play: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck and reveal up to one card with the type (Egghead) other than [Lillith] and put it into your hand. Then, put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck and reveal up to one card with the type (Egghead) other than [Lillith] and put it into your hand. Then, put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.
If your leader is Vegapunk, play this card.
